modName: Ciwen and Calerial - Nude Patches UNP CBBE CBPE Litheria
summary: Nude patches for [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29800]Calerial - Standalone Archer Illusionist Elf Follower[/url][/b] and [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28922]Ciwen the Elf Witch and her Staff of Nonsense[/url][/b]
descriptionHtml:
UNP, CBBE, CBPE, UNP More Curve, Litheria nude patches for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29800/?]Calerial[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28922/?]Ciwen[/url]. Here's how to do it:

For both girl's UNP:
1. download and install the main file from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29800/?]Calerial[/url] or from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28922/?]Ciwen[/url]
2. overwrite it with the correct woman's nude patch for UNP on this page

For Calerial's UNP More Curve:
1. download and install the main file from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29800/?]Calerial[/url]
2. overwrite with the UNP More Curve file here.

For both girl's CBBE:
1. Download the main file from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29800/?]Calerial[/url] or from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28922/?]Ciwen[/url] and install it
2. Download the CBBE Conversion from either [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29800/?]Calerial[/url] or from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28922/?]Ciwen[/url] and install it over the top of the main file
3. Finally, overwrite everything with the woman's nude patch for CBBE from this page

For Calerial's CBPE:
1. Download the main file from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29800/?]Calerial[/url] and install it
2. Download the CBPE Conversion from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29800/?]Calerial[/url] and install it over the top of the main file
3. Finally, overwrite everything with the woman's nude patch for CBPE from this page

For Ciwen Ivywalker Litheria Conversion*:
1. download and install the main file from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28922/?]Ciwen[/url]
2. overwrite it with the Litheria conversion on this page

* this is Ciwen's true form ^^

What to wear recommendations:
[url= http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22168/?]UNP or UNPetite - Hmm What To Wear by Nightasy and Brokefoot [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25461/?]HN66s Litheria - Race - BodyReplacer - Armors by humannature66 and ginnyfizz[/url]
[url=http://modtype.doorblog.jp/archives/31589143.html]fox 29 armor[/url]

Credits:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONZED UNP female body by Dimon99[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48531/?]Caliente Beautiful Petite Edition - CBPE - by Nikitaa[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25461/?]HN66s Litheria - Race - BodyReplacer - Armors by humannature66 and ginnyfizz[/url]
author: donnyducky
